interests.name: Tennis
interests.description: I have been playing tennis since grade 6 and was on the school team back in high school. As one of the only sports I am decent at, it taught me the importance of focus and perseverance.

interests.name: Swimming
interests.description: I learned how to swim at 6 years old and since then have swam for leisure, competition, and acquiring my lifeguarding certificate. Swimming taught me how to stay resilient and find balance amidst challenges.

interests.name: Gaming
interests.description: Although gaming is not one of my strongest suits, it feels like a nice escape from my busy schedule. Over the years, I enjoyed playing R6, Minecraft, Valorant, CSGO, Fortnite, and many more games with my friends.

interests.name: Photography
interests.description: Taking photos allows me to capture beauitful sights while expressing my creativity. Most of my photos involve landscapes and roads/paths. Photography has taught me to cherish the present moment and appreciate the beauty in the world around me.

interests.name: Traveling
interests.description: Visiting new places with family or friends to experience different cultures, cuisines, and natural wonders around the world is what travelling is all about. My favorite destinations so far are Japan, Switzerland, South Korea, and the Maldives.

interests.name: Gym
interests.description: I have been working out for around 3 years now, and I am still on the journey of achieving a good physique. For me, working out is not just about muscles, but also discipline and constant self-improvement, which are vital for success.
